title: The.Lavender.Lens(1995)[David.Johnson].mp4
description:
Hundreds of brief clips (each well under a minute) from movies from every decade in the 20th century, showing how gay men and women were portrayed and perceived. Laurel & Hardy, Charlie Chaplin, Rock Hudson, Franklin Pangborn, Bugs Bunny and all the rest, and so many more! What would Oscar Wilde look like in a cartoon from the 1930s? Intelligently edited and presented under the fair use doctrine.

Gay interest. Film history. Collated and produced in 1995 by David Johnson
